sourcesContent:
import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Participation} from "../../../Models/Entitys/Participation"; import {DataService} from "../../Services/data.service"; import {EpargneService} from "../../Services/epargne.service"; import {Epargne} from "../../../Models/Entitys/Epargne"; import {ActivatedRoute, Router} from "@angular/router"; import {Pret} from "../../../Models/Entitys/Pret"; @Component({ selector: 'app-buy-pret', templateUrl: './buy-pret.component.html', styleUrls: ['./buy-pret.component.scss'] }) export class BuyPretComponent implements OnInit { displayedColumns: string[] = ['position', 'name', 'pret','datePret','rembourse', 'verser', 'action']; dataSource:Pret[]=[]; epargne!: Epargne; constructor(private dataService:DataService, private epargneService:EpargneService, private activatedRoute:ActivatedRoute ) { } ngOnInit() { let snapshot = this.activatedRoute.snapshot; this.epargne = JSON.parse(snapshot.params["ep"]); this.epargneService.getDetteByEpargnes(Number(this.epargne.id)).subscribe( data =>{ this.dataSource = data; console.log("########## is done ##########",data); } ); } }
No. {{i+1}} Nom {{element.epargnant}} Montant Pret Non Date pret Non Reste a Verser Non Deja verser Non Payer
